casebody.data:
177 A.3d 124 DIRECT COAST TO COAST, LLC AND SELECTIVE TRANSPORTATION CORPORATION, PLAINTIFFS-PETITIONERS, v. JOSEPH PETERSON, INDIVIDUALLY AND AS AN AGENT OF THE BANFIELD GROUP, LLC, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT, AND LISA MARIE HARRISON, INDIVIDUALLY, AND AS AN AGENT OF THE BANFIELD GROUP, LLC AND JERRY KETEL, INDIVIDUALLY AND AS AN AGENT OF THE BANFIELD GROUP, LLC, DEFENDANTS.

C-429 September Term 2017

079901 December 13, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001384-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
